title: Update regarding HeavyTrucks Inc.
story_body:
HeavyTrucks Inc. (TRUCK) shares rose 3.2% in after-hours trading at 16:04:22 ET following unconfirmed reports of a potential acquisition. 

According to people familiar with the matter, who spoke on the condition of anonymity, there is speculation that a rival manufacturer may be considering a bid for HeavyTrucks Inc. Details of the alleged proposal, including the identity of the potential suitor and the terms of the deal, remain scarce. 

These rumors are entirely unconfirmed and should be treated with caution. HeavyTrucks Inc. has not publicly commented on the matter, and there is no guarantee that any discussions are taking place.

At 16:15:01 ET, HeavyTrucks Inc. stock was trading at $42.50 per share, up 3.5% from its closing price at 15:59:59 ET. Trading volume was moderate, with 235,100 shares exchanging hands.

HeavyTrucks Inc. has not responded to a request for comment.
